snippet: A huge explosion took place near the provincial governor’s offices in Lashkar Gah, the capital of Helmand Province.
abstract: Car bomb detonates near gathering of officials at governor's offices in Lashkar Gah, Afghanistan, killing seven people and wounding more than 45; officials say attack was prompted by military campaign to clear Taliban insurgents from Helmand Province.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED and TAIMOOR SHAH

lead_paragraph: A huge explosion took place near the provincial governor’s offices in Lashkar Gah, the capital of Helmand Province.

headline.main: Car Bomb Targeting Afghan Officials Kills 7 Civilians
headline.print_headline: 7 Civilians Die in Bombing Targeting Afghan Officials
